snippet: Nigeria eliminated heavily favored Greece to advance to the semifinals of the Olympic basketball qualifying tournament in Caracas, Venezuela.
abstract: Nigeria eliminates heavily favored Greece, 80-79, to advance to the semifinals of the Olympic basketball qualifying tournament in Caracas, Venezuela; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria eliminated heavily favored Greece to advance to the semifinals of the Olympic basketball qualifying tournament in Caracas, Venezuela.

headline.seo: Nigeria Upsets Greece in Olympic Basketball Qualifier
headline.main: Greece Is Upset in Olympic Basketball Qualifier
